attributes.action: Remove Portugal from the red list travel ban
attributes.additional_details:
The discriminatory nature of the restrictions that continue to be applied by the United Kingdom to passengers from Portugal need discussion. These restrictive measures are as more incomprehensible as the Portuguese epidemiological situation has evolved very favourably and there is no prevalence of the Brazilian and South African variants.All flights from Brazil are also banned. 
500 000 portugese citizens living in UK and 50 000 UK citizens living in Portugal,are suffering with those measures.
attributes.background: Allow travelers from Portugal to quarantine at home like any other passenger from other European countries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577159
